        Sessions findSession(Connection con,
                   String sessionid)
                     throws SQLException
        Returns the id of the operator running the session identified by sessionId.
        Parameters:
        con - connection
        sessionid - the session id
        Returns:
        int 0 is returned if the sessionId is not valid.
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • deadSessionsTimeStamp

        void deadSessionsTimeStamp(Connection con)
                           throws SQLException
        Calls during the server start.
        Checks and cleans open sessions.
        Checks the database consistency and repairs if it's not the case.
        Checks other parameters necessary for the correct processing.
        Parameters:
        con - connection
        Throws:
        SQLException
